eventDescription: Chennai React is a community of React developers in Chennai. We meet every month to discuss the latest in React, share knowledge, and build connections.

eventDescription: CTOtalk Annual Summit 2025 is happening on October 25 at ITC Grand Chola, Chennai. Join 1000+ CTOs, CDOs, VPs, and engineering leaders from India's top tech companies as they share real-world AI strategies, challenges, and innovations. Expect deep-dive tech sessions, unfiltered peer insights, and a gathering of leaders building the future. Early bird registration closing soon!
